list.name: Changes
list.comment:
docs: Add and improve Javadocs for EventRepository methods
Adds and refines the documentation for public methods within the `EventRepository` class. This includes documenting the purpose, parameters, and return values for the following methods:
- `updateParticipantStatus` - `acceptInvitation` - `declineInvitation` - `inviteNextFromWaitingList` - `listenToParticipantStatus`

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
refactor: Standardize participant status and enhance invitation UI
Refactors participant status strings for consistency: - `CONFIRMED` is now `accepted` - `CANCELLED` is now `declined` - `SELECTED` is now `invited`
Enhances the event invitation screen: - Fetches and displays event details (title, time, location, price, description). - Removes the real-time status listener (`listenToParticipantStatus`) in favor of a simpler, one-time action UI. - Adds null checks for `eventId` and `userId` in `EventInvitationActivity` to prevent potential crashes. - Improves logging in `EventRepository` for better debugging.

task.summary:
feat: Add "Notify Selected Entrants" button and functionality
Adds a "Notify Selected Entrants" button to the organizer's event details screen. This allows organizers to send a bulk notification to all participants who have been selected for the event.
- Implements `notifyAllSelectedEntrants` in `EventRepository` to fetch participants with a "SELECTED" status and send them a notification. - Adds a placeholder `sendNotificationToUser` method for future FCM integration. - Adds the "Notify Selected Entrants" button to the `org_my_event_details_activity.xml` layout. - In `OrgMyEventDetailsActivity`, a confirmation dialog is now displayed before sending notifications to prevent accidental sends.

feat: Add "Edit Event" button and functionality
Adds an "Edit Event" button to the organizer's event details screen, allowing organizers to navigate to the event editing page.
- Adds the "Edit Event" button to the `org_my_event_details_activity.xml` layout. - Implements an `onClickListener` for the new button in `OrgMyEventDetailsActivity` to launch the `EditEventActivity`.

fix: Update Edit Event button and layout
- Updates the `OrgMyEventDetailsActivity` to launch `OrgEditEventActivity` instead of `EditEventActivity` when the "Edit Event" button is clicked. - Reorders the buttons in the `org_my_event_details_activity.xml` layout for better organization.

style: Remove trailing newline
Removes a trailing newline character from the end of `OrgMyEventDetailsActivity.java`.

fix: Remove duplicate editButton declaration and unused code
Removes a duplicate declaration of the `editButton` variable. Also deletes an unused `onClickListener` for the `editButton` and the initialization for a non-existent `eventImage` ImageView.

test: Add instrumented tests for EventRepository
Adds a new Android instrumented test class, `EventRepositoryTest`, to verify the functionality of `notifyAllSelectedEntrants`.
- **testNotifyAllSelectedEntrants_Success:** Verifies that the success callback is triggered when there are selected entrants. - **testNotifyAllSelectedEntrants_OnlyNotifiesSelectedUsers:** Ensures that the logic correctly identifies and targets only participants with a "SELECTED" status. - **testNotifyAllSelectedEntrants_NoSelectedUsers:** Confirms that the function completes successfully even if there are no selected participants for an event. - **testNotifyAllSelectedEntrants_InvalidEventId:** Checks that the function handles non-existent event IDs gracefully without errors.

feat: Add bulk notification for waiting list and cancelled entrants
Adds functionality to send bulk notifications to participants based on their status.
- Implements `notifyAllWaitingListEntrants` to send notifications to all users with a "PENDING" status. - Implements `notifyAllCancelledEntrants` to send notifications to all users with a "CANCELLED" status. - Adds `logNotificationSent` to record notification metadata in a new `notificationLogs` collection for auditing purposes.

refactor: Simplify Javadocs and add notification logging
Refactors the `EventRepository` class by removing redundant and overly descriptive Javadoc comments for multiple methods, making the documentation more concise.
- Adds calls to `logNotificationSent` within `notifyAllSelectedEntrants`, `notifyAllWaitingListEntrants`, and `notifyAllCancelledEntrants` to create an audit log for bulk notifications. - Removes a trailing newline character from the end of the file.

docs: Add and improve Javadocs for EventRepository methods
Adds and refines the documentation for public methods within the `EventRepository` class. This includes documenting the purpose, parameters, and return values for the following methods:
- `updateParticipantStatus` - `acceptInvitation` - `declineInvitation` - `inviteNextFromWaitingList` - `listenToParticipantStatus`

feat: Add "Notify Selected Entrants" button and functionality
Adds a "Notify Selected Entrants" button to the organizer's event details screen. This allows organizers to send a bulk notification to all participants who have been selected for the event.

feat: Add "Edit Event" button and functionality

- Implements `notifyAllWaitingListEntrants` to send notifications to all users with a "PENDING" status. - Implements `notifyAllCancelledEntrants` to send notifications to all users with a "CANCELLED" status. - Adds `logNotificationSent` to record notification metadata in a new `notificationLogs` collection for auditing purposes.

- Adds calls to `logNotificationSent` within `notifyAllSelectedEntrants`, `notifyAllWaitingListEntrants`, and `notifyAllCancelledEntrants` to create an audit log for bulk notifications. - Removes a trailing newline character from the end of the file.
